home.title: Welcome to MindBloom
home.description: Your safe space for understanding and improving student mental well-being. Use our AI tool to get insights or explore our resources.
home.heroAlt: A person in a calm, supportive environment

form.label: Share your thoughts
form.placeholder: Describe how you've been feeling lately, what's on your mind, or any challenges you're facing...

validation.minLength: Please enter at least 50 characters to get an accurate analysis.

error.title: Analysis Failed

resources.title: Mental Health Resources
resources.description: Find the support you need. Here is a directory of on-campus, national, and peer support services.

1.name: Campus Counseling Center
1.description: Confidential counseling services for all registered students.

2.name: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline
2.description: Free and confidential support for people in distress, prevention and crisis resources for you or your loved ones.

3.name: The Trevor Project
3.description: The world's largest suicide prevention and crisis intervention organization for LGBTQ (lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, and questioning) young people.

4.name: Peer Support Network
4.description: Connect with trained peer volunteers who can offer a listening ear and share their own experiences.

schedule.description: Book a confidential session with one of our counselors. Select a date and time that works for you.
